attributes.action: Ban all old people from the roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Old people are slow witted and unsafe at any speed. Get them off the damned road, and back to drinking tea and eating soggy bisuits. The old sods! And they get bits of food stuck in the corners of their mouths. I've had enough!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
